entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Changes to bring templates into SDK introduces source-build prebuilts #27089
  • [Ubuntu 22.04] dotnet doesn't find installed SDKs #27082
  • Failure to publish WASM when project source path contains blank spaces - Reopened from #26061 #27073
  • PublishRelease with t:\publish, solutions, and Publishing as Release by Default #27066
    7.0.2xx

Closed

  • Workload install always fail #27075
  • dotnet pack wrong path on DotNetCoreCLI@2 [Azure DevOps] #27080

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove SystemInformation dependency #27090
    Area-Workloads
  • Adding support for VS Designtime targets for worker projects #27087
    Area-WebSDK
  • Parser for actual msbuild property syntax #27086
    Bug, Area-CLI
  • [Templates] marked template packages as shipping #27083
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #27072
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #27071
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1923733 #26992
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #27054
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support left and right names for assembly set #27024
    Area-ApiCompat
  • [Blazor] Handle _GlobalPropertiesToRemoveFromProjectReferences in the SDK #27057
    Area-AspNetCore, 7.0.1xx
  • Removed own implementation of Reporter in `TemplateEngine.Cli` #27021
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #27062
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Get PublishRelease and PackRelease working in .*proj #26808
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1935418 #27043
    Area-Infrastructure
  • `dotnet-new`: dotnet post-actions are moved to `dotnet` project #27039
  • [dotnet new] telemetry for MSBuild evaluation #27042
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add rule for detecting attribute differences #26891
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Fix for --print-download-link only #27064
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix dotnet test --blame parameters to validate incoming values, and update help #26963
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Removing default ProduceReferenceAssembly value for F# #26306
    Area-Infrastructure
